column69: Effect: After you pay for a card or standard project with a basic cost of 20 MC or more, you gain 4 MC.
Effect: You may always pay 7 plants, instead of 8, to place 1 greenery.
column70: You start with 2 plant production, 3 plants, and 36 MC.

column69: Effect: You may use heat as MC. You may not use MC as heat.
column70: You start with 3 heat production and 42 MC.

column69: Effect: Each time you play an event, you gain 2 MC.
column70: You start with 20 steel and 30 MC.

column69: Effect: Your temperature, oxygen, and ocean requirements are +2 or -2 steps, your choice in each case.
column70: As your first action in the game, draw 3 cards. Start with 45 MC.

column69: Effect: Each time you get any steel or titanium as a placement bonus on the map, increase your steel production 1 step.
column70: The earliest private enterprises on Mars focused on mining and exporting minerals off the surface. As the mega-corporations arrive to terraform, the miners unite in the Guild to defend their interests. With their expertise and knowledg of the planet they will be a worthy contender in the race.

column69: Effect: Your titanium resources are each worth 1 MC extra.
column70: You start with 10 titanium and 23 MC

column69: Effect: Each time any Jovian tag is put into play, including this, increase your MC production 1 step.
column70: You start with 1 titanium production and 42 MC.

column69: Effect: When playing an Earth card, you pay 3 MC less for it.
Effect: When any city tile is placed ON MARS, increase your MC production 1 step. When you place a city tile, gain 3 MC.
column70: You start with 40 MC. As your first action in the game, place a city tile.

column69: Effect: When playing a power card OR THE STANDARD PROJECT POWER PLANT, you pay 3 MC less for it.
column70: You start with 1 energy production and 48 MC.

column69: Action: If your Terraform Rating was raised this generation, you may pay 3 MC to raise it 1 step more.
